answers.answer: Having diabetes has nothing to do with the accuracy of an HIV test.If taken at the right time it will always be accurate.
When is the right time and when will it b 100% accurate?

question: i have a question for a friend of mine  thought i would ask on here for them  .... my friend took a 6 months 182 days hiv ora quick HIV test by mouth they might have  diabetes is the test still accurate for them
title: might have diabets is the test till accurate?
